prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon that resembles a sturdy boulder with a shiny eye.
I want a Pokemon that has a rocky exterior and emits a faint glow.
Generate a small creature with a tough shell and a curious eye peeking out.
Make a Pokemon inspired by a pebble, but with unique color features.
Imagine a creature that combines elements of rocks and minerals in its design.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a living stone, complete with a shiny core.
Give me a Pokemon that is both sturdy and compact, perfect for rocky terrains.
